TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeCompiler

summary.span: 定义用于调用源代码编译的接口或使用指定编译器的 CodeDOM 树。

span.span: Defines an interface for invoking compilation of source code or a CodeDOM tree using a specific compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，代码提供程序由、、和的实现组成 。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 在 .NET Framework 2.0 中， 、 和 方法已过时， 并且和的方法 直接在类中可用 。In the .NET Framework 2.0, the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 应在代码提供程序实现中重写这些方法，而不调用基方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 可以为特定编译器实现接口，使开发人员能够以编程方式将程序集编译代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 编译单元、包含源代码的字符串或源代码文件。The interface can be implemented for a specific compiler to enable developers to programmatically compile assemblies from Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) compile units, strings containing source code, or source code files. 接口提供了在运行时调用具有指定参数的编译的功能，并提供编译后的与编译相关的访问信息（包括结果代码）以及编译器返回的任何错误或警告。The interface provides the capability to invoke compilation with specified parameters at runtime and access information related to compilation after compilation occurs, including the result code, and any errors or warnings the compiler returns. 每个编译方法都接受一个 指示编译器设置的对象，并返回一个 指示编译结果的对象。Each compile method accepts a object that indicates settings for the compiler, and returns a object that indicates the results of the compilation. 编译器开发人员应提供此接口的实现以支持动态编译。Compiler developers should provide an implementation of this interface to support dynamic compilation. 实现者还应考虑实现此接口，以便为其提供 CodeDom 支持的语言提供编程编译功能。 implementers should also consider implementing this interface to provide programmatic compilation capability for the language that they are providing CodeDom support for.

abstract member CompileAssemblyFromDom : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters * System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit -> System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults

param.name: options
param.span: 一个 对象，它指示编译设置。

span.span: A object that indicates the settings for compilation.
A that indicates the code to compile.

summary.span: 使用指定的编译器设置从指定的 所包含的 树中编译程序集。

span.span: Compiles an assembly from the tree contained in the specified , using the specified compiler settings.

returns.span: 指示编译结果的 对象。

span.span: A object that indicates the results of compilation.

summary.span: 基于包含在 对象的指定数组中的 树，使用指定的编译器设置编译程序集。

span.span: Compiles an assembly based on the trees contained in the specified array of objects, using the specified compiler settings.
